name: Chevron Cotton Dhurrie Rug
description:
Product: Chevron Cotton Dhurrie, Made by hand.

Size: Approx. 6' x 9'. You have the option to order this item in any size. You may find your size near the 'Add to Cart' button above or tweet us at @oweave with desired size. We'll include the price on this page within 24 hours.

Fabric: 100% Cotton.

Color: White, Blue

Delivery: This product is made for you, and ships within 6 weeks.

Freight: Buy as many items, freight is always $9 within U.S. (except rug or furniture). You also have the option to save on freight and pickup in Atlanta.

Returns: We have a 30-day return on standard sizes. Sorry, no returns on personalized sizes (denoted with an * next to size).
